ResponseRule.name: Disc Rifle: First Time Equiped
ResponseRule.description: First time the player equips the Disc Rifle

ResponseRule.name: Disc Rifle: Equiped, Phase 0 (First Strange Comment Not Ready)
ResponseRule.description: First time a strange comment plays. This sets the logic in motion for all the other strange comments that fire. On Equip or on Target killed. Whichever happens first.

ResponseRule.name: Disc Rifle: Equiped, Phase 1 (First Strange Comment Plays)
ResponseRule.description: Equip lines for if the player has not yet crossed into phase 1 and therfore the firs strange comment is not ready to play.

ResponseRule.name: Disc Rifle: Equiped, Phase X (Normal Comment)
ResponseRule.description: These comments play if the player is in phase 1 or 2 but it's not time to say somethign weird.

ResponseRule.name: Disc Rifle: Equiped, Phase 1 (Strange Comment)
ResponseRule.description: Player is in Phase 1 and it's time to make a weird comment.

ResponseRule.name: Disc Rifle: Equiped, Phase 2 (First Phase 2 Comment)
ResponseRule.description: The player has killed enough targets and heard enough comments that the rifle is ready to ask for the player to destroy.

ResponseRule.name: Disc Rifle: Equiped, Phase 3 (First Phase 3 Comment)
ResponseRule.description: Player has killed enough and re-rwritten the rifle's core so that now it has accepted its fate as a killer.

ResponseRule.name: Disc Rifle: Unequiped
ResponseRule.description: When a target is locked down in the psychoscope.

ResponseRule.name: Disc Rifle: Target Aimed
ResponseRule.description: When a target is locked down in the psychoscope.

ResponseRule.name: Disc Rifle: Target Locked
ResponseRule.description: When a target is locked down in the psychoscope.

ResponseRule.name: Disc Rifle: Target Hit
ResponseRule.description: When a target is locked down in the psychoscope.

ResponseRule.name: Disc Rifle: Target Killed, Phase 1 (First Strange Comment Plays)
ResponseRule.description: When a target is locked down in the psychoscope.

ResponseRule.name: Disc Rifle: Target Killed, Phase 1 (Strange Comment)
ResponseRule.description: When a target is locked down in the psychoscope.

ResponseRule.name: Disc Rifle: Target Killed, Phase 2 (First Phase 2 Comment)
ResponseRule.description: The player has killed enough targets and heard enough comments that the rifle is ready to ask for the player to destroy.

ResponseRule.name: Disc Rifle: Target Killed, Phase 2 (Strange Comment)
Disc Rifle: Target Killed, Phase 2 (Final Strange Comment)
ResponseRule.description: This is in case we want it to finally shut up even if you decide not to pursue the quest at all.

ResponseRule.name: Disc Rifle: Target Killed, Not Phase 3--Alien
ResponseRule.description: When a target is locked down in the psychoscope.

ResponseRule.name: Disc Rifle: Target Killed, Not Phase 3--Human
ResponseRule.description: When a target is locked down in the psychoscope.

ResponseRule.name: Disc Rifle: Target Killed, Not Phase 3--Operator
ResponseRule.description: When a target is locked down in the psychoscope.

ResponseRule.name: Disc Rifle: Target Killed, Phase 3 (Alien)
ResponseRule.description: When a target is locked down in the psychoscope.

ResponseRule.name: Disc Rifle: Target Killed, Phase 3 (Human)
ResponseRule.description: When a target is locked down in the psychoscope.

ResponseRule.name: Disc Rifle: Target Killed, Phase 3 (Operator)
ResponseRule.description: When a target is locked down in the psychoscope.

ResponseRule.name: Disc Rifle: Target Missed
ResponseRule.description: When a target is locked down in the psychoscope.

ResponseRule.name: Disc Rifle: Malfunction
ResponseRule.description: When jammed.

ResponseRule.name: Disc Rifle: Malfunction, Phase 3
ResponseRule.description: When jammed.

ResponseRule.name: Disc Rifle: WhileEquiped, Phase 1 (Strange Comment)
ResponseRule.description: Player is carrying around the rifle and it pipes up during phase 1.

ResponseRule.name: Disc Rifle: WhileEquiped, Phase 2 (Strange Comment)
ResponseRule.description: Player is carrying around the rifle and it pipes up during phase 2.

ResponseRule.name: Disc Rifle: WhileEquiped, Phase 3 (Killer)
ResponseRule.description: Player is carrying around the killer version of the rifle and it pipes up.

ResponseRule.name: Disc Rifle: You Recycled Me. Thanks!
ResponseRule.description: Player put the disc rifle into the recycler and hit the button.

ResponseRule.name: Disc Rifle: In Psychotronics
ResponseRule.description: Disc Rifle makes a comment while the player is wandering around in Psychotronics.

ResponseRule.name: Disc Rifle: Comment About Dahl
ResponseRule.description: Disc Rifle makes a comment while Dahl is actively hunting the player.

ResponseRule.name: Disc Rifle: Comment About Exterior
ResponseRule.description: Disc Rifle makes a comment while the player is wandering space.

ResponseRule.name: Disc Rifle: Touched Coral
ResponseRule.description: Player put the disc rifle into the recycler and hit the button.
